title: H.R. Pufnstuf: The wheely bird
brief_description: Jimmy, his magic flute Freddy and best friend H.R. Pufnstuf have to battle the evil Witchiepoo. In this episode, Jimmy and Pufnstuf use a bird-shaped “Trojan Horse” as a trick in order to enter Witchiepoo’s castle to recover the stolen Golden Flute Freddie.
